blogPost.excerpt: Timedash combines your most vital daily information in one nifty widget: time, date, weather & a daily step counter, all available in one clear overview. Carefully designed with lots of attention to detail, Timedash is a must have widget for your Home Screen!
blogPost.body: Timedash combines your most vital daily information in one nifty widget: time, date, weather & a daily step counter, all available in one clear overview. Carefully designed with lots of attention to detail, Timedash is a must have widget for your Home Screen!
blogPost.title: Timedash Widget - Combines your vital daily information into one nifty widget
blogPost.author: Vincent Meertens

localize.description: Timedash将您最重要的日常信息整合到一个小工具中：时间、日期、天气和每日步数，所有这些都在一个清晰的概述中提供。精心设计，注重细节，Timedash是你的主屏幕必备的小工具。
localize.tagline: 将您的重要日常信息整合到一个精美的小工具中

localize.description: Timedash將您最重要的日常信息整合到一個小工具中：時間、日期、天氣和每日步數，所有這些都在一個清晰的概述中提供。精心設計，注重細節，Timedash是你的主屏幕必備的小工具。
localize.tagline: 將您的重要日常信息整合到一個精美的小工具中

previous.excerpt: Covering 249 countries, Canitravel.net helps international travelers navigate Coronavirus restrictions worldwide. Whether you're looking to repatriate, meet your loved one, or find safe travel destinations, you can plan your next trip with confidence.
previous.title: Canitravel.net - Covid restrictions made simple – A new way to travel

localize.description: Canitravel.net覆盖249个国家，帮助国际旅行者了解全球范围内的冠状病毒限制。无论您是想回国、与亲人相聚，还是寻找安全的旅行目的地，您都可以放心地计划您的下一次旅行。
localize.tagline: Covid的限制变得简单--一种新的旅行方式

localize.description: Canitravel.net覆蓋249個國家，幫助國際旅行者瞭解全球範圍內的冠狀病毒限制。無論您是想回國、與親人相聚，還是尋找安全的旅行目的地，您都可以放心地計劃您的下一次旅行。
localize.tagline: Covid的限制變得簡單--一種新的旅行方式

next.excerpt: Smoothly prepared for Food Intolerance and Vegan Diets. Tasty and healthy smoothie recipes. It serves easy, gluten-free, lactose-free and nut-free recipes for users keen on their health.
next.title: Smoothly - Food intolerance and vegan diet recipes

localize.description: 为食物不耐受和素食者准备的冰沙。美味和健康的冰沙食谱。它为热衷于健康的用户提供简单、无麸质、无乳糖和无坚果的食谱。
localize.tagline: 食物不耐受和素食食谱

localize.description: 爲食物不耐受和素食者準備的冰沙。美味和健康的冰沙食譜。它爲熱衷於健康的用戶提供簡單、無麩質、無乳糖和無堅果的食譜。
localize.tagline: 食物不耐受和素食食譜
